transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji good afternoon sir Pangaria traders se baat ho rahi hai.
Executive: Boliye.
Executive: Ji sir main Anshu baat kar rahi hu India Mart se account manager sir aapke catalog mein kafi cheeze missing hai uske regarding maine aapko connect kiya hai.
Customer: Mam bande ko bhejo jab maal bechna hota hai product bechna hota hai na India Mart tab banda 50 baar aata hai mere paas mein visit karne.
Customer: Aur usko char saalo ka visit karte karte uske baad mein usne aake mere ko shakal hi nahi dikhai.
Executive: Matlab aap kya keh rahe hain.
Customer: Meri baat suno hum itne padhe likhe nahi hai ki hum aapko online hum aapki cheez deal kar sake us bande ko jab aapko salesman jab usko product bechna tha wo 50 baar kya aaya tha mere paas mein jab maine usko 33000 diye uske baad usne aake mere ko shakal hi nahi dikhai.
Executive: Achcha koi baat nahi sir aap nahi kar sakte to aapke behalf se ye cheeze main aapki theek kar dungi but aap mujhe kuch bataiye.
Customer: Mam meri baat suniye.
Customer: Us bande ko bhejo wo aayega jisse wo usko baat karke main usko deal kar lunga.
Customer: Nahi to ab main aapko phone pe mere paas nahi to laptop khula hua hai main kya kar lunga aapke samne.
Executive: Theek hai sir main aapse zyada kuch nahi bolungi.
Customer: Aap us bande ko bhej sakte ho to bhej do nahi to nahi to mere ko to 33000 doob gaye mere ko koi fark nahi pad raha India Mart ki negative rating hai mere liye banda jab pehle saala 50 baar roj aata tha roj mere call pe roj mere ko pareshan karta tha ki bhaiya le lo le lo le lo aur jab product bech diya uske baad mein aake shakal nahi dikhai Badal Soni ne.
Executive: To aapne unhe ye cheez batai thi ki aap laptop
Customer: Usko unko bola tha 100 baar dono ne kaha tha bhaiya meri guarantee hai main aake deal karunga.
Executive: Achcha aisi baat hai iske baad bhi.
Customer: Aur uske baad mein aake shakal nahi dikhai mam ye koi tarika thodi hai matlab ki mil mila ke paise lene wali baat hai.
Executive: Hmm main aapki concern samajh rahi hu to ab tak aapne kabhi bhi ye India Mart ka portal use nahi kiya hai matlab jitna main samajh pa rahi hu.
Customer: Meri baat suno wo mere ko bata ke gaya hai kya wo aata hai banda online call karte ho aap log jab wo banda fir pehle jab wo bola tha bhaiya main dikhaunga main aapka wo folder banaunga kya folder banaya usne paanch product mere bina paise ke dale hue the uske baad mein usne mujhe kuch kara hi nahi.
Executive: Achcha ye paanch product to mere bina folder ke bina paise diye hue dale hue the free wale app mein hi.
Executive: Theek hai isme aapki profile banaunga main aapka folder banaunga itna sundar main aapko roj saat call laake dunga kaun si call aa rahi hai mere paas mein char mahine ho gaye ye call nahi aati hai buyer ki.
Customer: Aati hai aap logo ki call aati hai.
Executive: Achcha aapko ab tak buyers ki call nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Aa rahi hai dekho na aapke paas koi buylead aayi kya aapke paas aap to check kar sakte ho.
Executive: Haan main check kar sakti hu main check kar rahi hu isliye to main aapse puch rahi hu ki mere paas to cheeze show ho rahi hai ki aapko leads aa rahi hai sab aa rahi hai but buyer ki call nahi aa rahi hai ye cheez to wali cheez hai main dekhti hu aapka PNS number.
Customer: Lead aati hai to mithai ki lead aa rahi hai hum goan bechte hai mithai ki lead aa rahi hai na to wo keyword usne proper dal rakhe hai na usne aage check kara ki kya keyword pe sale lead aayegi.
Customer: Keval product bechna hai 33000 lootna hai uske baad usne humko dimag hi nahi lagaya matlab kya kiya humne 33000 lene ke baad wo banda mere ko aage shakal bhi nahi dikhai usne.
Executive: Okay aisi baat hai matlab main jitna dekh pa rahi hu ki aapki shuru hui hai kitni tarikh se sorry July mein shuru hui hai matlab aapne aaj tak.
Customer: Uske baad mein uska meeting code hai kya dekho ye cheez bhi to aap dekh sakte ho ki Badal Soni ka meeting code hai kya mere paas kitni baar aake mila wo mujhse.
Executive: Theek hai to aap mujhe matlab aap seedha seedha ye bata dijiye theek hai main unse connect karti hu jinhone aapko ye cheez sale kari thi na unhe ek baar connect karti hu fir main unko batati hu ki aapke baat hai but aap mujhe ek baar ye bata dijiye ki like ab tak aapne ek baar bhi portal use nahi kiya hai na.
Customer: Shuru shuru mein kiya tha ek do baar.
Executive: Ek do baar aapne use kiya tha to like aapko cheeze jo chhoti moti thi like buylead consume karna ye sab aapko pata tha.
Customer: Humko samajh mein nahi aaya aap call karke batate ho aap nahi to hamare paas us time pe portal khulta hai aap batate ho uske baad mein mere paas local banda nahi hai kya India Mart ka jo meri dukan pe aake mujhe samjha sake.
Customer: Usi ko bhejna jis bande ne jo aapka jo team manager hai jo jo mere se paise le gaya tha usi ko bhejo Badal Soni ko usne kaha tha main sab deal kar lunga aapke chal paise de do.
Executive: Main aapki baat samajh rahi hu main aapka pura pura concern samajh rahi hu but theek hai dekhiye sir ab to aapke paise chale gaye ab main to aapko service de sakti hu even main aapko main janti hu ki koi bhi cheez itni aasan nahi hai hamara portal hai koi product nahi hai aap koi ek din mein khol ke aap nahi seekh sakte agar aapke paas do minute ka ya 10 minute ka samay ho na aap mujhe dijiye main aapko sari cheeze baith ke brief mein bataungi aur jin insan ne aapko ye jisne bhi hamare employee ne aapko ye sale kiya hai main unke bhi unko bhi ek baar represent karungi ki aisi cheeze.
Customer: Dekho bhejo unke samne aapka portal kholta hu sham ko 5 baje ka bhej do unko main bola 5 baje meeting code hai 5 baje aake meeting karni hai aapko aur unko samjhana hai party ki complaint aa rahi hai.
Executive: Ek uske liye aap complaint to dalo maine kam se kam char baar bol diya ki un bande ki complaint hai koi koi reaction hi nahi hota hai.
Customer: Na aake wo banda milta hai mujhse.
Executive: Main samajh rahi hu aapka concern ab to fir theek hai ye cheez chali theek hai main aap keh rahe hain ki main unko ek baar to fir ek baar unko represent karti hu to agar wo aayenge to fir aap karenge na.
Customer: Bilkul karenge.
Executive: Theek hai ab tak aapne portal use nahi kiya theek hai sir main ek baar unko kar dungi but inke nahi hota hai na to filhal main hi aapka account handle kar leti hu aap please mere sath ek baar.
Customer: Mam mujhe mam mera calling time likho sham ko 5 se 6 ya 4 se 6.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai fir aaj possible hota hai to theek hai otherwise main aapko isi number pe.
Customer: Subah 10 baje India Mart wale call karte hai 10 baje aati jab aapke paas samay hota hai kya 10:30 11 baje ho gaya aadhe ghante meeting kar lete hai hamare paas samajh nahi raha hamara retail outlet hai hum logo ke paas itna time nahi hota hai 4 se 6 ka meeting code rakh lo kabhi bhi phone kar dena mujhe aur us Badal Soni ko bhejna please.
Executive: Theek hai sir main dekhti hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants the executive to send Badal Soni.

- Has not received buyer calls in four months.

- Dissatisfied with the services after paying ₹33000.

- States that the executive did not visit after payment.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to represent the issue.

- Executive offered to handle the account.

- Executive noted the calling time.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect with the sales representative.



Alert (If Any):

complaint

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, complaint, refund, sales representative
